data.text: @hkfp They are so sensitive to criticism. Sign of a guilty conscious?
@hkfp BS propaganda letter “written” by a stooge.  Nikkei should just toss it in the bin.
@hkfp I hope Nikkei can show their stance and stand with the journalist who wrote the passage.

@hkfp I know dozens of people who left because of the NSL.  Foreigner and HK'er alike. The NSL is a total disgrace and a complete abrogation of the Basic Law and any sense of HK as a free and open city.  

HK is finished.  "Asia's World City" my ass.
@hkfp The letter has neither refuted the misunderstandings nor revealed the 'truth' (if any).

@hkfp What a Muppet! Chinese propaganda may work somewhat on mainlanders but China makes the mistake in believing THEIR Propaganda works on everyone else. No, the rest of the world prefers  BBC or CNN sources of propaganda.
@hkfp Show them some colours of the #HKPoliceState 😡

@hkfp People generally don't care about their kids education, seeing friends, going to a dinner, isolation camps with bars on the windows, seeing people arrested for "social media"...

It must be the weather!  Summer is super muggy in HK.  Get out now to beat the heat.
